trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',chassis,{$ILO}].str("on")}=0 & {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',chassis,{$ILO}].strlen(0)}>1
trigger_prototype.name: Server not powered on

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}",sensor,'{$ILO}',discrete].diff(0)}>0 & {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}",sensor,'{$ILO}',discrete].strlen(0)}>2
trigger_prototype.name: {#KEY} status changed

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,'{$ILO}',discrete].str("Lost")}=1 | {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,'{$ILO}',discrete].str("Non-redundant")}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Fans not redundant

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,"{$ILO}",discrete].str(error)}=1 & {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,"{$ILO}",discrete].str(Correctable)}=0) | {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,"{$ILO}",discrete].str(fault)}=1 | {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,"{$ILO}",discrete].str(fail)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: IML Memory error

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}",sensor,{$ILO},discrete].str("Non-redundant")}=1 | {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}",sensor,{$ILO},discrete].str("Lost")}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Power not redundant

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,{$ILO},discrete].str("OK")}=0 & {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,{$ILO},discrete].str("N/A")}=0 & {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['{#KEY}',sensor,{$ILO},discrete].strlen(0)}#0
trigger_prototype.name: Hardware {#KEY} too high

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}","sensor",{$ILO},discrete].str(fault)}=1 | {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl["{#KEY}","sensor",{$ILO},discrete].str(fail)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: {#KEY} problem

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['Firmware Revision',bmc,{$ILO}].diff(0)}>0 & {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['Firmware Revision',bmc,{$ILO}].strlen(0)}#0 & {Template IPMI Script iLO Discovery:ipmi_proliant.pl['Firmware Revision',bmc,{$ILO}].strlen(#2)}#0
trigger.name: iLO Firmware was changed
